import React, { useState } from 'react'; import AdminSidebar from '../Components/AdminSideBar.jsx'; function AdminBookCreator() { const [book, setBook] = useState({ title: '', subtitle: '', authors: '', publisher: '', description: '', pageCount: 0, categories: '', rating: 0, maturityRating: 3, image: '', price: 0, }); const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setBook((prevBook) => ({ ...prevBook, [name]: value, })); }; return (
{/* Form and Book Details Container */}
